name: punkt. netServices
tag_list: semantic-web, enterprise-2-0, enterprise-wiki, issue-management, thesaurus-management, metadata-management
overview: Vienna based punkt.netServices was founded in 2000 and is a specialised software company which offers expertise in the areas of conception, implementation and maintenance of Enterprise 2.0 systems. punktâ€™s focus lies on web-based information management systems & community environments as well as on web-based (semantic web) components and web-services and on intelligent search mechanism by means of ontologies and thesauri. The focus of punkt’s research and development activities lies on web-based semantic components and in the fields of knowledge - & information management as well as on content management itself. Through a network of qualified industrial (e. g. Atlassian Sydney/Australia, TextTech Leipzig/Germany, OpenLink Software/UK, ParsGroup Vienna/Austria) and scientific partners (e. g. Know Center Graz/Austria, University of Leipzig/Germany, Salzburg Research/Austria) punkt. ensures its competitive edge and complements its market offerings by diverse industry-specific solutions. The company relies on an interdisciplinary team of business economists, software engineers and humanists with extensive experience in planning and implementing complex (information management) projects.
